thread.title: Expect ‘Divine,’ outrageous stories, parodies and songs with Charles Busch
thread.title_full: Expect ‘Divine,’ outrageous stories, parodies and songs with Charles Busch | Dallas Morning News

author: Churnin
title: Expect ‘Divine,’ outrageous stories, parodies and songs with Charles Busch
text:
Expect outrageous personal stories and adult language, film parodies and classic songs, as two-time Manhattan Association of Cabarets and Clubs award winner Charles Busch brings A Divine Evening With Charles Busch to the Wyly Theatre.
The AT&T Performing Arts Center continues its Off Broadway on Flora season with the author and star of The Divine Sister , Vampire Lesbians of Sodom , The Tribute Artist and the Tony Award-nominated Tale of the Allergist’s Wife .
Oct. 29-31 at the Wyly Theatre, 2400 Flora St., Dallas. $45-$65. 214-880-0202. attpac.org .
On Twitter:
 @nchurnin
